ygData.subject: Re: Welcome to eqpaladin@onelist.com
ygData.msgSnippet: I think they meant for the holy swords to be a continuous quest. For instance, you start the soulfire quest and over the course of your life (ie. till level
ygData.messageBody:
I think they meant for the holy swords to be a continuous quest. For
instance, you start the soulfire quest and over the course of your life (ie.
till level 50) you find other bits and pieces until you finally are powerfull
enough to get Soulfire sword.

I personally think that this whole Guk discussion is a mot point. He has a
really powerful sword. You don't. You want the sword? Kill him and get it.

OR:

You can do a huge quest (See: Soulfire) waste hours of your life learning the
Froglok tongue, hundreds of platinum on expenses, and even more time figuring
out and doing the Quest and then FINALLY getting the sword.

Unless you RP 24/7, just kill the damn NPC and get the sword! You'll save
yourself hundreds of headaches.
